title: 5 Second Wait before Disconnect?
body:
Not sure why this was deleted from gameplay as it deals with gameplay, but here it is again

Is there any reason why you need to wait 5 seconds before you can disconnect. When I play i try reconnecting cause there are times where I'm lagging all game until I reconnect. People might say, it's to prevent people from leaving game. First off, no it won't. Secondly people can just alt tab the game if they want to avoid 5 seconds. So why not get rid of it entirely?
